name: api-extension
description: Example extension that uses a RemoteExampleApi proxy to work with an example API inside a helper extension.

scripts.clean-install-lib: cd ../remote-example-api && yarn pack --prod && cd ../example-extension && npm install --no-package-lock --no-optional --no-shrinkwrap --only=prod --no-save -f ../remote-example-api/remote-example-api-v0.0.1.tgz
scripts.build-all: yarn run clean-install-lib && yarn run compile
